record.title: COMMENDING THE UNIVERSITY OF LOUISVILLE CARDINALS FOOTBALL TEAM FOR THEIR 2007 ORANGE BOWL VICTORY
record.chair: The pending business is the question of suspending the rules and agreeing to the resolution, H. Res. 82, as amended.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Kentucky (Mr. Yarmuth) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 82, as amended, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 60, I was unable to vote due to weather and traffic delays. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
